rewards: If you max f2p, 4 200 stranger 3x packs and 16 440 strangest 3x packs will give you nita skin. Skew more towards stranger packs if you miss waffles. Buy the stranger packs early on to unlock more card packs quicker.
boss: Must play in trios. Matchmaking is bugged and doesn't filter difficulty. You get an auto loss if you play with someone on a different difficulty.
